working_style.description: Keep existing working Python code since it's proven in dev. Focus on KubeRay native patterns for deployment rather than custom YAML manipulation.
principles: Use KubeRay native resources (RayCluster, RayJob, RayService)

validation_required.ray_dashboard_accessible: Must access Ray dashboard at localhost:8265
validation_required.kubernetes_cluster_healthy: Must verify all pods running properly

CRITICAL_TO_THIS_PROJECT.description: NEVER use alternative libraries or approaches to simplify. Always use the exact libraries specified in project requirements.
examples: NEVER use generic HTTP clients instead of project's specified libraries
NEVER use simplified approaches when project has specific implementation requirements
NEVER replace core dependencies with alternatives without explicit user approval
NEVER use different model sources than specified in project configuration
ALWAYS use project-specified libraries even if they seem complex
ALWAYS follow existing project patterns rather than creating new ones
CRITICAL_TO_THIS_PROJECT.consequences: Using alternatives will break integration, cause unexpected behavior, and invalidate testing
